name: YNTMA
description:
Oh, did I say "Outsmarting?"

I meant killing yourself to prevent an evil cult of short people from literally stealing secrets from your brain.

feel free to parkour around, fly on a ladder, or even shoot yourself, because in this game you can never just outrun the cult.

Do not buy this game if you have suicidal thoughts or depression.

by viewing this page you agree not to cause intentional harm to yourself or others.

TIPS:

To craft a pot give the anvil 3 rocks and a stick or two

To craft a wrench give the anvil 1 metal

To craft metal give the forge 2 rocks

to cook meat put it in the forge

to make meat give the butcher iron or gold

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

E - Interact

ESC- Main Menu

R - Reset Achievements
